segments.text: There’s something almost magical about the way light filters through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet it’s overshadowed by the increasing puddle at the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so entranced with that plate when everything else is falling apart?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s excitement over cookies somehow heightens my anxiety, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the boy is actually balancing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly things can change in a moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just a small slip, and all their joy could turn into tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
